subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: LeBron James and Dwyane Wade put together a highlight reel of dunks while leading the Heat to a rout at Barclays Center, ending the Nets’ eight-game home winning streak.
snippet: LeBron James and Dwyane Wade put together a highlight reel of dunks while leading the Heat to a rout at Barclays Center, ending the Nets’ eight-game home winning streak.
